jinngine.physics.constraint.joint
Class HingeJoint

java.lang.Object
  jinngine.physics.constraint.joint.HingeJoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constraint
public final class HingeJoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constraint

Implementation of a hinge joint. This type of joint leaves only one degree of freedom left for the involved bodies, where they can have angular motion along some axis.

getHingeControler

public JointAxisController getHingeControler()
Get the axis controller for the hinge joint. Use this controller to adjust joint limits, motor and friction

Returns:
A controller for this hinge joint
